name: @theproductroadmap/homebridge-macos-remote
description: This plugin allows you to control your mac remotely from anywhere through HomeKit, allowing you to inspect if your device is locked and potentially locking it protecting your data from afar. Additionally this plugin allows you to run any shortcuts you have setup on your device. (This requires a companion MacOS app available on www.github.com/mksvrcek/homebridge-macos-remote
author: mksvrcek
